definition.para: Location in which the moving images were recorded.

instructions.para: Enter the name of the places in which the video segments were recorded.
Separate multiple places using a semi-colon.
Use the GeoNet (https://community.esri.com/) form of the name, if available. If not, use the most common form/spelling.
Enter the name of the places in which the video segments were recorded.
Separate multiple places using a semi-colon.
Use the GeoNet (https://community.esri.com/) form of the name, if available. If not, use the most common form/spelling.

example.para: Skotoussa (Kentriki Makedonia, Greece); Irakleia (Kentriki Makedonia, Greece)
Skotoussa (Kentriki Makedonia, Greece); Irakleia (Kentriki Makedonia, Greece)

admin.para: In CONTENTdm, map to DC map = Coverage-Spatial.

history.justification: Needed a field to enter the place where the dances were video recorded.

changeLog.change: Change property label to singular. Most properties-files labels are singular (?); attempting to normalize. BMR
